basics.name: Not Provided
basics.label: SVP, Business Banking, SVP, Administration/Operating/Finance, President, EVP, Business Development/Emerging Markets, Consultant, Financial Analyst, Finance Manager
basics.summary: Executive Banker with experience in all facets of banking: growth strategy (retail and commercial); operations; business development; sales and marketing, all with an entrepreneurial spirit. A macro-level thinker with a proven track record for structuring and negotiating sound, credit-worthy business and building strong teams, able to meet company-wide financial goals.

work.name: Company Name
work.position: SVP, Business Banking, SVP, Administration/Operating/Finance, President, EVP, Business Development/Emerging Markets, Financial Analyst, Consultant, Finance Manager
work.summary: Managed multiple roles across different organizations, contributing significantly to business development, finance, administration, and strategic planning.
highlights: Successfully merged and negotiated the Bank's merger with Finance & Thrift via a reverse stock split acquisition.
Successfully raised $6.4 million in CRA via equity capital (SPA) stock purchase agreement - July 2014.
Led the Bank's cost restructuring by decreasing headcount by 29%, selling two of the three branches, and netting $1.1 million in capital proceeds, saving the bank $637 thousand annually.

education.institution: Pepperdine University, Graziadio School of Business and Management
education.area: Business Administration and Private Capital Markets
